channel.title: Stock Momentum on FinanClub

item.title: CLF
item.description: score:20 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs (CLF) has gained strong momentum recently and is still trading at a reasonable price. Shares of Cleveland-Cliffs (CLF) have started gaining and might continue moving higher in the near term. The U.S. International Trade Commission voted to strike down anti-dumping duties on tin mill steel from Canada, China, Germany and South Korea, which could potentially benefit Cleveland-Cliffs (CLF).
